long_description: With a padded sleeve for a tablet or 13 in. laptop, the Patagonia Mass Sling combines the support of a backpack with the hands-free convenience of a messenger bag. Features a single shoulder strap and a thinner webbing strap for stability; spin the single strap around front to easily reach all your gear. Main compartment opens with a side zipper; 3 inside pockets, including a padded one for a smartphone, keep small items organized. Mesh padding on the molded back panel and shoulder strap keeps you cool. Reflective front panel; lash point for attaching a light (light sold separately). Patagonia Mass Sling is made of sturdy, water-resistant 600-denier recycled polyester. Closeout.
short_description: With a padded sleeve for a tablet or 13 in. laptop, the Patagonia Mass Sling combines the support of a backpack with the hands-free convenience of a messenger bag.
